Package com.flipkart.business

Interface FlipfitCustomerServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipfitCustomerService
public interface FlipfitCustomerServiceInterface
Author: JEDI-Group D - Flipkart Development This interface defines the operations for customer management, including viewing gyms, creating customer profiles, and managing bookings.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createCustomer(String name, String email, String phone, String password, String city, String pincode, String username)
    Creates a new customer profile with the provided details.
    boolean
    editProfile(FlipFitCustomer customer)
    Edits the profile information of the specified customer.
    List<Booking>
    viewBookings(String userId)
    Retrieves a list of bookings associated with the specified user.
    List<FlipFitGyms>
    viewGyms(String city)
    Retrieves a list of gyms located in the specified city.
    void
    viewProfile(FlipFitCustomer customer)
    Displays the profile information of the specified customer.

  • Method Details

    • viewGyms

      List<FlipFitGyms> viewGyms(String city)
      Retrieves a list of gyms located in the specified city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city in which to search for gyms.
      Returns:
      A list of gyms available in the specified city.

    • createCustomer

      void createCustomer(String name, String email, String phone, String password, String city, String pincode, String username)
      Creates a new customer profile with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the customer.
      email - The email of the customer.
      phone - The phone number of the customer.
      password - The password for the customer's account.
      city - The city of the customer.
      pincode - The pincode for the customer's address.
      username - The username chosen by the customer.

    • viewBookings

      List<Booking> viewBookings(String userId)
      Retrieves a list of bookings associated with the specified user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of bookings for the specified user.

    • viewProfile

      void viewProfile(FlipFitCustomer customer)
      Displays the profile information of the specified customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer whose profile is to be viewed.

    • editProfile

      boolean editProfile(FlipFitCustomer customer)
      Edits the profile information of the specified customer.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer whose profile information is to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the profile was updated successfully; false otherwise.
